name: Oh no! I can't control my legs!
name_original: Oh no! I can't control my legs!
description:
Made with <3 in <48h for GMTK Game Jam 2021. Theme: "Joined Together".

Oh no! I can't control my legs!  (good thing I can use somebody else's!)

You must escape the laboratory... but your legs aren't responding!

Thankfully your brain implant still works, and when you connect it to others around you, their movements control your legs too!

Controls:

- Mouse click to connect or disconnect from the enemies.

OR

- Arrow keys can also be used to loop between the targets.

- Space bar to connect/disconnect

- S to skip the current level (but beware the penalty!)

Just reach the exit!

Made from scratch for the gamejam by @elFlashor
